resources.string: " MideTool is the perfect tool for the creation of MIDE (Information Method of Excursions). With it you can create and share your MIDEs to inform the characteristics and difficulties of your excursions, routes and hiking. Perfect to share later on your social networks. More information in the help section."

The severity of the medium is calculated with the application of the list of risk factors: each factor is counted only once and its computation is 0 or 1, regardless of its probability and presence in greater or lesser part of the excursion. The assessment of the severity of the medium is obtains from the correspondence between the score (from 1 to 5) and the amount of selected items in this section. You can add more factors if you consider it appropriate from the settings section.

" Premise: Most of the excursions are composed of sections that would obtain different valuation in the aspects \"Displacement\" and \"Itinerary\"; however the user needs a valuation for your excursion. Criteria to be applied: For each aspect, the different sections will be evaluated. A section is a part of an excursion with sufficient entity to be considered an excursion in itself or for its inclusion or exclusion modify the assessment of that aspect. The excursion will be rated in each aspect as the highest rated stretch. The valuation of a section must be that of the predominant terrain in it, admitting isolated steps up to a point above this graduation. The minimum assessment to be assigned to a stretch is a minor point that its step of maximum degree. In Difficulty of Displacement, a section that presents a step of score 4 (use of the hands) in which an error of the hiker can cause his fall to the emptiness or sliding down the slope, It will be rated 4 (and therefore the tour also)."

" The hours of effective march of an excursion is the sum of the hour calculation for each of the different sections that compose it. The effort evaluation is obtained from the correspondence between the score (from 1 to 5) and the time intervals (up to 15 hours)."

Son las motivadas por accidentes del terreno que dificultan el desplazamiento y que requieren técnicas de progresión aprendidas y/o equipamiento especializado. Son la progresión en nieve, la escalada algo difícil de tramos cortos y el descenso en rápel.

My name is Adolfo and I am an application development student. I developed this app for Android as a final project of the Higher Degree in Development Multiplatform Applications. I`m also training in web application development and videogame development in 2D. If you have any suggestions on how to improve this application or do you think it could be added Any feature that improves it, do not hesitate to contact me by mail. Contact me at: amcdevelopment@gmail.com MIDETOOLS version: 1.0
